element-hq/synapse

Reference implementation for Matrix - decentralized chat that federates across servers like email but for messaging

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Official Matrix.org bridge in beta that connects Matrix rooms and Discord channels, syncing messages, images, and user profiles so you can chat across both platforms
  • Admin console for Matrix Synapse homeservers
  • open source messenger for matrix protocol, simple interface, group chats, stickers, encryption
  • Matrix stack for non-commercial use
  • Rust library for email-based instant messaging
  • low-code platform for building chatbots and multi-agent workflows
  • bridge WhatsApp and Matrix chats
  • off-grid encrypted mesh chat and file sharing
  • Rust services and libraries powering chat platform
  • Platform for chat and agents on Amazon Bedrock
